items.sentence: You can get to her house in a variety of different ways.
I thought it would be better if you told Tom to do that.
I'm nervous, but I don't think I'm as nervous as Tom is.
Tom doesn't seem to be as important as Mary seems to be.
Tom quite often forgets to put his wallet in his pocket.
Tom spends a lot of time sitting in front of a computer.
I thought that it wouldn't be safe to cross that bridge.
Tom said that he hopes Mary won't allow John to do that.
Tom said that Mary is going to go to Boston to see John.
I don't know whether I should tell Tom the truth or not.
